work_experience.title: Manager
points: Monitored revenue and expenditures on supplies and equipment.
Planned, distributed, and managed work schedules for staff, as well as organized menus, specials, and events.
Oversaw inventory management and ensured proper stock levels.
Obtained proper licensing and permits and maintained communication with food suppliers, event staff, and customers.

work_experience.title: Snowboard Instructor
points: Provided one-on-one and group snowboarding lessons to clients of varying ages (5-50) and skill levels (beginner to expert).
Offered support and monitored clients' progress systematically to help them improve their snowboarding skills.
Promoted lessons, boarding passes, and services of the tuning shop to visitors.
Ensured the maintenance and proper functioning of equipment during early and late operating hours.

work_experience.title: Executive Board: Brand and Marketing Lead, Project Lead
points: Maintaining social media platforms for the club, documenting our events, and recruiting new members.
Curating lesson plans and presentations in a team environment for Camp Harbor View to teach coding fundamentals and JavaScript in recurrent bi-weekly lessons to students in grades 10-12.
Designing curricula such as a Python/ML workshop, HTML/CSS workshop, and our Microbit workshop.
Planned and marketed a circuit-based hackathon with over 100 applicants.

projects.title: Image Processor
points: Developed software in Java to edit images of varying file types, including layer support.
Implemented and tested features including saving session progress and GUI functionality using Java Swing.

projects.title: Personal Website
points: Developed a personal website using JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and Framer Motion.

projects.title: Time and Place (TAP)
points: Developed the front-end of a web application using TypeScript, React, Node, CSS Tailwind, and Bootstrap, with MongoDB as the database to store user data.
The application allows users to create personal events, join events, and be notified of events near or associated with a university.

projects.title: VeHealth
points: Programmed the front-end of the website using TypeScript, React, Node, CSS Tailwind, and Bootstrap, with Firebase as the database to store user data and handle user login.

Developed a Web3 application concept that allows users and health insurance providers to trade verified user health data for discounts on healthcare using smart contracts written in Solidity on the Vechain blockchain.

projects.title: CampFire
points: Developed an iOS app in Swift to help users stay organized and manage daily tasks, featuring Firebase Auth, Firebase Database, and UIKit.
Implemented features like biometric authentication, dark mode, and notifications.

projects.title: iOSChat
points: Developed a live chat application for iOS using Swift, Firebase Auth for registration and authentication, and Firebase Database for storing user data and messages.

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Database
points: Implemented the Raft consensus algorithm to manage logs in a key-value database, doubling performance by optimizing the state machine and election processes.
Conducted thorough testing using a custom suite of stress, crash, and jitter tests, to ensure reliable performance.

projects.title: Web Crawler
points: Implemented a web crawler to retrieve a set of flags from a large fake social media platform by recursively crawling through pages.
Kept track of uncrawled URLs in a queue and crawled URLs in a separate array.
Managed HTTP responses, re-crawling pages that returned a 500 response.

projects.title: Lightweight Spreadsheet Editor
points: Developed a spreadsheet in React, using TypeScript, SCSS (Sass) with full functionality for basic operands, customizable fonts, and cell selection.
Thoroughly tested using Jest unit tests.

projects.title: BibimBot
points: Developed a Discord bot with a multitude of commands in Python, capable of playing music in voice channels from a URL, importing emotes, and various user-to-user interactions.
Hosted and deployed the bot on a Raspberry Pi, utilizing GitHub Actions to automatically detect a new commit to update and restart the process.

projects.title: Mental Health Chatbot
points: Engineered an LSTM-based sentiment analysis model integrated with a language model (LLM) to effectively differentiate between sentiments in user inputs, targeting emotion detection for a mental health chatbot.
Enhanced model performance through preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, and finetuning data, increasing LSTM prediction accuracy from 10% to 70% compared to the base model.

volunteering.title: Brand and Marketing Lead, Project Lead
points: Curate lesson plans and presentations for a younger audience.
Planned and taught coding fundamentals and JavaScript basics to high schoolers at Camp Harbor View in recurrent bi-weekly lessons.
Designing curricula such as a Python/ML workshop, HTML/CSS workshop, and our Microbit workshop.
Planned and marketed a circuit-based hackathon with over 100 applicants.

volunteering.title: Eagle Scout Project || Gazebo
points: Oversaw risk management practices while planning, coordinating, and leading troop activities.
Planned, fundraised over 3 thousand dollars, and constructed a gazebo for a local Buddhist temple.
Oversaw a construction zone, ensured safety protocols were followed, and the final project met building code and regulation.

volunteering.title: Blood Drive Ambassador
points: Facilitated client registration for blood donation, ensuring proper data collection.
Managed post-donation care, providing nourishment and other necessities to donors.
Maintained a sanitary environment by cleaning all surfaces between clients, adhering to COVID-19 safety guidelines.

volunteering.title: Emergency Room Volunteer
points: Delivered essential amenities such as blankets, water, and food to patients to ensure their comfort.
Ensured the availability of medical equipment by regularly restocking throughout the hospital.
